details: Supporting GSA on an active federal contracts.
IRA-IRS, Event Driven Architectures, Developed the front end using React and Apollo Client. Contributed to the UI/UX design of the Event Catalog platform.
OLS-IRS, Created and updated React-based UI components for the IRS development team.
TaskTracker, Collaborated with a team to build a comprehensive tool using React.js for tracking employee availability, project assignments, and contract progress across Booz Allen.
Designed and built an internal CMS for business clients (including companies and corporations) using Next.js.
Redesigned and enhanced UI features across multiple banking platforms to improve usability and visual consistency.
Designed and created mock-ups for new features and public-facing pages for federal clients, including the CDC and U.S. Army.primarily using modern.
Developed a new corporate website from the ground up to align with updated branding and accessibility standards.
Built interactive data visualizations using D3.js for NCHS statistical reports.
Maintained and updated national COVID-19 statistics on a daily and weekly basis for public dashboards.
Built responsive and reactive web applications using Angular, Vue.js, and Ionic
Collaborated with UX researchers to translate insights into polished multi-page web and mobile app designs.
Collaborated with team members on project requirements and solutions
Sub-contracted to Deloitte LLP, where I joined the design and development team of a customer appointment tracker using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js.
